children.en: Children 6â€“11 pay half the adult fare. Under 6 ride free if no seat is occupied.

disabilities.en:
You need to go to a â€œMidori no Madoguchiâ€ (â€œGreen Ticket Windowâ€) found in most major JR stations to buy a ticket.
      /n If you are a wheelchair user, your seating options are limited. The better option is to get a reserved seat. 
      /n While the boarding tickets can be purchased from a machine, it is best to tell the counter your desired destination 
      /n and time of departure to reserve a seat and ensure you get one you can use. JR recommends booking your seats two days 
      /n in advance.
disabilities.es:
